Gardena.Vistamar School:
Vistamar School is a private, co-educational college-preparatory high school in El Segundo in Los Angeles County, California, USA.
Vistamar School opened in September 2005, following almost four years of research, planning, fund raising and personnel recruitment. The school has a 76,000-square-foot (7,100 m2) building at 737 Hawaii Street in El Segundo and has remodeled approximately half the space for student use. Enrollment in 2012-13 was about 270 students.
